definition[0]: if you live to a ripe old age, you are very old when you die
example[0]: Eat less and exercise more if you want to live to a ripe old age.
definition[1]: used to show that you find it surprising or impressive that someone is doing something or has achieved something at a very young age â€“ used humorously
example[1]: She was put in charge at the ripe old age of twenty-nine.
